Share:
A Muslims's Duaas (prayers) never go unanswered. At times, Allah Ta'ala
grants us exactly what we ask for, and at times, out of his wisdom, he
grants us something else which in fact is better for us than that which we
asked for.

What is the reason for your depression. It is imperative for you to find a
senior Aalim whom you feel comfortable with and you have confidence in him.
Relate your condition to him on a regular basis. If you carry this out, then
Insha Allah, we have confidence that you will be able to overcome your
current state of affairs.

We make Du'aa for your wellbeing.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Imraan Vawda / Mufti Ebrahim Desai
